messages.message: Hey team! I need to add a post-install action that sends a request to webapp. I'm trying to figure out how to set up the connection between webapp and the post install action. Do we have some guide on this?

it seems that `post_install_setup_util` offers ways (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/a31cfafb1cfd0f20ea19b125ccff2604f811bb6a/shared-utils/py-utils/solution-utils/src/py/instabase/solution_utils/post_install_setup_util.py#L4) to connect to file service, job service, account service, and repo service

so existing post-install actions (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/tools/onprem/post-install-action-base-model-upload/src/py/copy_solutions_and_publish.py) use `post_install_setup_util` to create clients for those services, and then optionally use those clients to call other utils
also fyi in case you havenâ€™t seen this https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CP/pages/2079162413/Post-Install+Actions+V2
Ohh didn't know that there are also post install actions written in python
Thank you, Serena. I'll look into this!
